articles.title: ‘Koi agar bol raha hai’: Hardik on Gavaskar, Shastri's India T20I captain remark - Hindustan Times
articles.description: After India won the three-match T20I series against New Zealand following the third T20I ending in a tie via DLS method, Hardik was asked how he perceives the views of Sunil Gavaskar or Ravi Shastri, who see in him as a long-term captain. | Cricket
articles.content: There is no doubt about the fact that Hardik Pandya has raced ahead of KL Rahul and Rishabh Pant as far as the next India limited-overs captain is concerned. Officially, KL Rahul is still the vice-ca… [+3086 chars]
